sourcesContent:
import { useThree } from '@react-three/fiber'
import React from 'react'
import { forwardRef, Fragment, useCallback, useEffect, useImperativeHandle, useMemo } from 'react'
import { Group, OrthographicCamera, Scene } from 'three'

const ImperativeComponent = forwardRef((props, ref) => {
  const { id, setWindowSize, setCurrentSize, setResizeChanged, setBrowserTabVisibilityChanged, useCamera, onImpMount } = props

  // state and store

  const useThreeConetxt = useThree()
  const { scene, gl } = useThreeConetxt

  useImperativeHandle(ref, () => ({ ...useThreeConetxt }))

  onImpMount()

  return <Fragment />
})

export default ImperativeComponent
